Name: Brotherhood of Randis
Description: Founded in 2988 from a small group of Christian MechWarriors led by Erdelmaine Randis, the Brotherhood came to the defense of a small Periphery planet against raiders and criminals. After securing it, the order then renamed the world to Randis VI, with its members dedicated to its protection and following a strict training regimen using BattleMechs.
ReputationStatements: The alpha and the omega dictate the actions of the valiant.
The alpha and the omega dictate the actions of the valiant.
The alpha and the omega dictate the needs of the valiant.

MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. We obviously placed our faith in the right mercenary company. We'll let you know if we have any other work for you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You win some, you lose some. Sometimes it's in between. I'm disappointed you couldn't complete the contract, but at least you gave it your best shot.
BadFaithFailureStatements: For somebody who came so highly recommended, you let us down pretty hard. Thanks for nothing, I guess.
